mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_plant( plant_id, plant_name, plant_name_eng, plant_genus, plant_family, plant_order, plant_class, plant_phylum, plant_toxicity, plant_lifespan, plant_type, plant_height, plant_spread, plant_stemcolor, plant_leafcolor, plant_leaftype, plant_flowercolor, plant_flowersize, plant_bloomtime, plant_fruitcolor, plant_harvesttime, plant_temperature_imin, plant_temperature_imax, plant_dormancy, plant_growthseason, plant_growthrate, plant_culture_epv, plant_culture_ev, plant_culture_biv, plant_culture_gu, plant_culture_symbolism, plant_culture_if) VALUES( PLANT_SEQ.nextval, #{plant_name}, #{plant_name_eng}, #{plant_genus}, #{plant_family}, #{plant_order}, #{plant_class}, #{plant_phylum}, #{plant_toxicity}, #{plant_lifespan}, #{plant_type}, #{plant_height}, #{plant_spread}, #{plant_stemcolor}, #{plant_leafcolor}, #{plant_leaftype}, #{plant_flowercolor}, #{plant_flowersize}, #{plant_bloomtime}, #{plant_fruitcolor}, #{plant_harvesttime}, #{plant_temperature_imin}, #{plant_temperature_imax}, #{plant_dormancy}, #{plant_growthseason}, #{plant_growthrate}, #{plant_culture_epv}, #{plant_culture_ev}, #{plant_culture_biv}, #{plant_culture_gu}, #{plant_culture_symbolism}, #{plant_culture_if})
